title: 大阪杯の後に・太陽、揺るがず

text.jpText:
無我夢中で走りエアグルーヴに勝利するも、
いまだエアグルーヴの覇気にあてられて
震えてしまう自分を自覚するメジロドーベル。
text.enText:
She runs selflessly and wins the race against 
Airgroove, but she still finds herself 
trembling from Airgroove's dominance. Mejiro 
Dobel is aware that she is still trembling 
from Airgroove's supremacy.

text.jpText:
果たしてこれでエアグルーヴのように
なれたと言えるのか？
その胸中には焦燥のみが存在していた――
text.enText:
Could she really say that she had 
become as good as Airgroove? Only 
frustration existed in her heart…

text.jpText:
控室に戻るなり『宝塚記念』出走への
意欲を示すがエアグルーヴのようになろうと
必死なその姿に再び違和感を覚えてしまう。
text.enText:
As soon as she returned to the waiting room, 
she expressed her desire to run in the 
"Takarazuka Kinen," but she again felt 
uncomfortable in her desperate attempt to be 
like Airgroove. But she is desperate to be 
like Airgroove, and once again, I feel a 
sense of discomfort.

text.jpText:
しかし、違和感の正体をすぐに言語化できず、
ひとまずはメジロドーベルの次の目標を
『宝塚記念』へ定めるのであった……。
text.enText:
However, she could not immediately 
verbalize the true nature of her discomfort. 
Takarazuka Kinen. ……
